set.name: DMC-21 Zakira's Dragon Commander Power-Up Pack

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Ghosts. ■ Each of your Ghosts in the battle zone has "slayer." (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-21 Zakira's Dragon Commander Power-Up Pack

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ This creature can attack untapped light creatures.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-21 Zakira's Dragon Commander Power-Up Pack

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each other darkness creature you have in the battle zone.

property.value: DMC-21 Zakira's Dragon Commander Power-Up Pack

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Choose a race. Each creature of that race gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ One of your creatures in the battle zone gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)
